function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of SARS-CoV-2 in a crowded workplace environment","Impact":"High risk of widespread infection and transmission within the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementing physical distancing measures, improving ventilation, and promoting remote work where possible","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, contact-tracing apps","People":"Employees, visitors, and anyone in close proximity to the infected individuals","Owner":"Employers, building managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"High secondary infection rate in choir practice","Impact":"Rapid and extensive spread of COVID-19 within the choir group","Mitigation":"Enforcing physical distancing, using masks, and improving ventilation in indoor spaces","Technologies":"Masks, air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Choir members, choir director, and attendees","Owner":"Choir leadership, event organizers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Risk of infection in meat-processing plant","Impact":"High potential for widespread infection and transmission among workers in the facility","Mitigation":"Implementing physical distancing, providing personal protective equipment (PPE), and improving ventilation","Technologies":"PPE, air purification systems, ventilation systems","People":"Workers, visitors, and anyone in close proximity to the infected individuals","Owner":"Employers, plant management, and public health authorities"}]}
